data.lyric:
[ti:Big Stepper (Explicit)]
[ar:Roddy Ricch]
[al:Big Stepper (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Big Stepper (Explicit) - Roddy Ricch
[00:11.89]Yeah
[00:13.28]Mm ayy
[00:14.60]Big stepper like Big Meech mhm
[00:16.98]I was taught to go and get it straight up out the mud lil' n***a
[00:20.03]Murder murder murder keep my slugs my n***a uh
[00:23.06]I was told to never show no love my n***a
[00:25.76]Pop a Xanax I ain't never had no feelings
[00:28.69]What I got planned next Gotta put the stars in the ceilings
[00:31.94]Slidin' down Fairfax n***a I was plottin' on the million
[00:34.89]I want a billion n***a so that's on God I ain't chillin'
[00:38.25]Yeah ha ha perky perky dirty soda
[00:41.48]Ayy only talk bags on the Motorola
[00:44.53]Ayy push the Hellcat like an old Corolla
[00:47.61]Ayy I'ma let these racks talk for me n***a
[00:50.68]B***h I done ride with the shooters ayy
[00:52.34]Made my cousin a killer
[00:53.84]In the '15 I was neighborhood drug dealer
[00:56.97]I'm so cold hearted I can't show no love n***a
[00:59.82]But I f**k that b***h to PARTYNEXTDOOR Persian Rugs n***a uh
[01:03.19]Bought a brand new AP it was 50.000 total
[01:06.33]It feel like the flu game when I sold out the Nova
[01:09.25]I had to finess and get the bag I had mad dough though
[01:12.37]If he ain't try and go get the safe I get it crackin' solo
[01:15.62]Mm ayy
[01:16.85]Big stepper like Big Meech mhm
[01:19.24]I was taught to go and get it straight up out the mud lil' n***a
[01:22.35]Murder murder murder keep my slugs my n***a uh
[01:25.40]I was told to never show no love my n***a
[01:28.13]Pop a Xanax I ain't never had no feelings
[01:31.13]What I got planned next gotta put the stars in the ceilings
[01:34.31]Slidin' down Fairfax n***a I was plottin' on the million
[01:37.35]I want a billion n***a so that's on God I ain't chillin'
[01:40.62]Vision bank account
[01:42.07]Had a bad b***h put a 100.000 in her spandex
[01:45.04]That 100 that made me million I got it laminated
[01:48.17]Can't f**k with none of these broke n***as they contaminated
[01:51.38]Thank God for all of these bluefaces I barely done made it
[01:54.55]Made 40.000 on new years took a private to Vegas
[01:57.60]I been on promethazine so long when I'm slidin' I'm faded
[02:00.71]I been tryin' to get a crib so long now I got it it's gated
[02:03.77]I been touchin' all of these millions I know they gon' hate it
[02:06.95]My chef cook up Filet Mignon got sauce and then ate it
[02:10.02]N***a I been ballin' every season like Kobe with aim
[02:13.30]All these n***as gon' hate
[02:14.79]I stayed down and got rich now I'm f**kin' on this lil' baby
[02:18.03]Mm ayy
[02:19.25]Big stepper like Big Meech mhm
[02:21.49]I was taught to go and get it straight up out the mud lil' n***a
[02:24.66]Murder murder murder keep my slugs my n***a uh
[02:27.75]I was told to never show no love my n***a
[02:30.46]Pop a Xanax I ain't never had no feelings
[02:33.41]What I got planned next gotta put the stars in the ceilings
[02:36.61]Slidin' down Fairfax n***a I was plottin' on the million
[02:39.63]I want a billion n***a so that's on God I ain't chillin'
data.trans:
[ti:Big Stepper (Explicit)]
[ar:Roddy Ricch]
[al:Big Stepper (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:11.89]//
[00:13.28]//
[00:14.60]不顾一切的追梦者 就像Big Meech
[00:16.98]从小家长就教育我 想要什么就努力去争取 小老弟
[00:20.03]残忍无情 我随时带着武器 我的兄弟
[00:23.06]他们教育我 千万不要心慈手软 我的兄弟
[00:25.76]来点那种东西 我从来没有感情
[00:28.69]我接下来的计划是什么 我要坐在车里看星星
[00:31.94]来到Fairfax 兄弟 我的目标是挣一百万
[00:34.89]我现在想要十亿 所以说 我不能停下休息
[00:38.25]心情舒畅 喝着加料的汽水
[00:41.48]掏出摩托罗拉 只谈论钱的事情
[00:44.53]开着道奇地狱猫 就像一辆老旧的丰田卡罗拉
[00:47.61]我要让我的钞票替我说话
[00:50.68]碧池 我真的有很多杀手朋友
[00:52.34]让我的表弟也变成了杀手
[00:53.84]想当初 我是咱们那一片有名的街头生意人
[00:56.97]我的心好冷酷 我没有一点爱
[00:59.82]但我让那个小妞很快活 在波斯地毯上 兄弟
[01:03.19]买了一块全新的爱彼手表 总价值五万
[01:06.33]当我的演出座无虚席时 我感觉登上了新台阶
[01:09.25]我必须想尽办法挣大钱 但我已经有超多票子了
[01:12.37]如果他不愿打开保险箱 那我自己一个人也要把它撬开
[01:15.62]//
[01:16.85]不顾一切的追梦者 就像Big Meech
[01:19.24]从小家长就教育我 想要什么就努力去争取 小老弟
[01:22.35]残忍无情 我随时带着武器 我的兄弟
[01:25.40]他们教育我 千万不要心慈手软 我的兄弟
[01:28.13]来点那种东西 我从来没有感情
[01:31.13]我接下来的计划是什么 我要坐在车里看星星
[01:34.31]来到Fairfax 兄弟 我的目标是挣一百万
[01:37.35]我现在想要十亿 所以说 我不能停下休息
[01:40.62]银行账户的钱越来越多
[01:42.07]找了个漂亮妞 把十万块塞进她的裤子里
[01:45.04]那些事情让我挣了上百万 钞票层层叠叠 不停增加
[01:48.17]不能跟这些穷鬼来往 他们都被腐蚀了
[01:51.38]感谢上帝让我挣了这么多大钞 我差一点就失败了
[01:54.55]新年那一天我就挣了四万块 乘着私人飞机去维加斯
[01:57.60]长久以来 我都沉迷于那种东西 每当我出现的时候 我都神志不清
[02:00.71]长久以来 我都想要买一套房子 现在我买到了 还有气派的大门
[02:03.77]我手上握着好多好多钞票 我知道他们会不高兴
[02:06.95]我的大厨给我做菲力牛排 蘸点调料 尽情享用
[02:10.02]朋友 我每一个季度都会挣到很多钱 就像科比一样
[02:13.30]这些家伙都会不高兴
[02:14.79]我沉住了气 现在富起来了 现在我身边有美女作陪
[02:18.03]//
[02:19.25]不顾一切的追梦者 就像Big Meech
[02:21.49]从小家长就教育我 想要什么就努力去争取 小老弟
[02:24.66]残忍无情 我随时带着武器 我的兄弟
[02:27.75]他们教育我 千万不要心慈手软 我的兄弟
[02:30.46]来点那种东西 我从来没有感情
[02:33.41]我接下来的计划是什么 我要坐在车里看星星
[02:36.61]来到Fairfax 兄弟 我的目标是挣一百万
[02:39.63]我现在想要十亿 所以说 我不能停下休息
